definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to run aground in mid-course/to run into difficulty and stop
to leave in the middle of the play/(fig.) to leave before the matter is concluded

sentences.chinese: 這趟公共汽車中途不停。

sentences.english: We stop at Pin Wu for lunch, but Sam and David never come down.
sentences.chinese: 中途，司機在平武停下車喫午飯，鵬和嫣沒有下車。

sentences.english: Somehow, I just don''t like to change horses in the middle of the stream.
sentences.chinese: 不知什麼緣故，我就是不喜歡中途換人。

sentences.english: To let base clouds o'ertake me in my way.
sentences.chinese: 讓鄙賤的烏雲中途把我侵襲。

sentences.english: The warning system was switched on halfway through the trial.
sentences.chinese: 這套警告系統在實驗的中途被啓動。

sentences.english: This morning, the Japanese attacked Midway Island.
sentences.chinese: 今晨日本人襲擊了中途島。

sentences.english: Cover and microwave on hight for 4 minutes, stirring once.
sentences.chinese: 蓋蓋微波爐高火轉4分鐘，中途攪拌一次。
他中途讓一個搭便車的人上了車。

sentences.english: They stopped off overnight in Edinburgh .
sentences.chinese: 他們中途在愛丁堡停留過夜。

sentences.english: All the girls swam across the lake except two who gave up halfway.
sentences.chinese: 所有的女孩都遊過湖了除了兩個中途放棄的。

sentences.english: Can I stopover with this ticket?
The studio is midway between his aunt's old home and his cottage.
sentences.chinese: 工作室就在從他姑姑的老宅到他的小屋的中途。

sentences.english: He had stopped to lean on a scaffold to drink beer from a “tall boy” can wrapped in a brown bag.
sentences.chinese: 中途他停下來靠在腳手架上，喝着一大瓶啤酒。

sentences.english: About halfway through your hike, you'll come across a picturesque waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 行至中途，你會不期遇到一個風景如畫的瀑布。

sentences.english: Vessel sailed from loading port to yingkou port directly . without discharging any cargo on the voyage.
sentences.chinese: 船舶由裝貨港直達營口港，中途未卸貨。

sentences.english: And this morning, the Japanese attacked Midway Island.
sentences.chinese: 今晨，日本人進攻了中途島。

definition: as the time draws near/at the last moment/temporary/interim/ad hoc
to shift to an earlier date/to do sth ahead of time/in advance
